name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.41 - The Reversi 2
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

A classic title that has made no compromise of achieving the fun of The Reversi.
As you win your way through the game you will be awarded gorgeous elements.
Set My Character and you can play knockouts/tournament battles.
Also compatible with detailed segmentation of levels and allows players to place the piece in the corner, so you can play with players of different levels.

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
